name: Forward (itch) (KindaExists)
description:
Forward is a platformer where you have somewhat limited movement, you play as a square and attempt to use your past mistakes to boost yourself the way forward.

This is a short 10 level - 6+ Minute Game.

Okay so this is actually my first game ever made and this was really meant for a Game Jam called "Summer Slow Jam July 2019: 3-Button, 3-Color Games" , though I wasn't able to finish it on time due to laptop issues. 

Now that these laptop issues are fixed, I'm releasing the somewhat unfinished (yet playable) game, and even if many things didn't go as I planned, I'm happy to still release this game and to start off game development with this - No matter how terrible the music and the game is.

 (Also Donations will also be happily accepted, but please never donate unless you really want to) .

Anyways, This is my first game Forward and I hope you enjoy!

 (or if you didn't then I'm very sorry )
